title: Clogard’s ‘Ape Pawulen Obe Pawulata’ campaign spreads hope among retailer network
body_lines: Clogard’s ‘Ape Pawulen Obe Pawulata’ was conducted in appreciation of the retailer network. The campaign is a testament to the brand’s commitment to the Sri Lankan people and was a timely gesture to help instil hope and unity for all those facing unprecedented challenges during the Avurudu season. Pictured are representatives of Clogard handing over the Avurudu gift packs to members of their retailer network
